title: "Synthetik Receives DHS Funding to Develop Machine Learning Data for Airport Screening Tech"
excerpt: "Synthetik Applied Technologies has secured $1M in funds from the Department of Homeland Security through the second phase of the Small Business Innovation Research program to build machine learning data that could simulate baggage and human travelers."
